Class TestRegister

  • java.lang.Object
    • TestRegister
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.apple.dnssd.BaseListener, com.apple.dnssd.RegisterListener

    public class TestRegister
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.apple.dnssd.RegisterListener
    Test utility for registering a sample Bonjour service. Useful for testing service discovery with the BonjourBrowser application.

    Usage: java TestRegister [options]

    • -n, --name <name> Service name (default: "Test Service")
    • -t, --type <type> Service type (default: "_http._tcp.")
    • -D, --domain <domain> Registration domain (default: "local.")
    • -p, --port <port> Port number (default: auto-assigned)
    • -d, --duration <mins> Duration in minutes (default: 10, 0 = infinite)
    • -h, --help Show this help message

    Thread Safety: This class is thread-safe. The stop() method can be called from any thread, including shutdown hooks.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TestRegister

        public TestRegister(java.lang.String serviceName,
                    java.lang.String serviceType,
                    java.lang.String domain,
                    int port,
                    int durationMinutes)
        Creates a new TestRegister instance.
        Parameters:
        serviceName - the name of the service to register (must not be null)
        serviceType - the type of the service (e.g., "_http._tcp.", must not be null)
        domain - the registration domain (e.g., "local.", null for default)
        port - the port number (0 for auto-assign)
        durationMinutes - duration in minutes (0 for infinite)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if serviceName or serviceType is null or empty

        serviceName - the registered service name
        regType - the service type
        domain - the registration domain

      • start

        public void start()
           throws com.apple.dnssd.DNSSDException,
                  java.io.IOException
        Starts the service registration and keeps it running. This method blocks until the duration expires or stop() is called.
        Throws:
        com.apple.dnssd.DNSSDException - if DNSSD registration call fails
        java.io.IOException - if server socket creation fails
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if start() has already been called
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if registration callback reports an error

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stops the service registration and releases resources. This method is thread-safe and can be called multiple times.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main entry point for the test registration utility.
        Parameters:
        args - command line arguments
